explanation: [0-0] On a motorcycle racing track, there are several motorcycles. Outside the guardrail at the edge of the track, there are many people wearing orange clothes. The upper half of the shot shows a rider leaning into a curve, with another motorcycle behind him and another in front. In front of him is a banner with the word "SHARK" in white and a logo to the left of the word. The lower half of the shot shows a rider leaning into a curve, with another motorcycle in front of him.

[0-10] In the upper half of the shot, a motorcycle rushes out from the right side. The rider gets up to adjust the posture of the motorcycle, raises his left fist, waves it, and continues the race. Below is a white subtitle with black text "2020#FrenchGP". In the lower half of the shot, the motorcycle that is leaning into the curve suddenly shakes from side to side, and the rider tries hard to adjust the posture of the motorcycle. Above is a white subtitle with black text "2023#FrenchGP".
